Testing Original Issue Scenario
==================================================

separability_matrix(cm) =

Expected:

✓ Complex compound model is correct

Step 3: Pix2Sky_TAN() & cm (nested compound model)
separability_matrix(nested_model) =
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
Expected (should be same as complex model):
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
✓ Nested compound model is correct - BUG IS FIXED!
